articles.title: Vermont has no facility for people incompetent to stand trial. Could that finally change?
articles.description:
Vermont lawmakers are considering a bill to address the gap. The debate centers on balancing defendants’ rights with public safety.

The post Vermont has no facility for people incompetent to stand trial. Could that finally change? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Vermont lawmakers are debating a bill to create trial competency facilities.
The proposed legislation aims to balance defendants' rights and public safety.
Boston residents may see changes in legal proceedings involving incompetent defendants.

articles.title: Former North Shore police officer gets prison time for child porn charge
articles.description:
The former patrol officer is sentenced to 4 years of prison and 5 years of supervised release, prosecutors say.

The post Former North Shore police officer gets prison time for child porn charge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former North Shore police officer sentenced to 4 years in prison for child pornography.
Officer also faces 5 years of supervised release following prison term.
Case raises concerns about trust in local law enforcement among Boston residents.

articles.title: ‘The finest kind’: Gloucester mourns 7 lost in Lily Jean sinking as Coast Guard launches probe
articles.description:
“There was nothing atypical or anomalous about their trip. They were doing exactly what we’ve done for 50 years.” 

The post ‘The finest kind’: Gloucester mourns 7 lost in Lily Jean sinking as Coast Guard launches probe appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seven fishermen from Gloucester lost in the sinking of the Lily Jean.
Coast Guard has launched an investigation into the incident.
Community mourning highlights the risks of local fishing industry.

articles.title: NBC bringing Super Bowl pregame show to Alcatraz Island
articles.description:
NBC announced Monday that the network will broadcast part of its pregame show before Sunday’s game between the Patriots and Seahawks from the island that used to be the site of a maximum security federal prison.

The post NBC bringing Super Bowl pregame show to Alcatraz Island appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: NBC will broadcast part of its Super Bowl pregame show from Alcatraz Island.
The show precedes the Patriots vs. Seahawks game on February 7, 2026.
Boston residents can enjoy unique Super Bowl coverage featuring a historic location.

articles.title: Why readers think Bill Belichick belonged in the Hall of Fame this year
articles.description:
After Belichick fell short of first-ballot induction into the Class of 2026, Boston.com readers largely called it a snub — though some eluded to Tom Brady and Patriots-era scandals as complicating factors.

The post Why readers think Bill Belichick belonged in the Hall of Fame this year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick was not inducted into the Hall of Fame Class of 2026.
Boston.com readers largely viewed this as a snub, citing 2026 as significant.
Local discussions highlight the impact of scandals on Belichick's legacy in Boston.

articles.title: Gas explosion in New Hampshire sparks a fire at a mental health facility
articles.description:
Three firefighters were injured when a natural gas leak caused an explosion and fire at a New Hampshire mental health center, but the building’s tenants and clients all evacuated safely.

The post Gas explosion in New Hampshire sparks a fire at a mental health facility appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Gas explosion at a New Hampshire mental health facility injured three firefighters.
All tenants and clients evacuated safely during the incident.
Boston residents should be aware of potential gas safety concerns.

From iconic plays to family traditions, share your most unforgettable Patriots Super Bowl moment.

summary: Boston residents are sharing unforgettable moments from Patriots Super Bowl history.

Community engagement strengthens local pride and connection to the Patriots.

articles.title: This runner is raising awareness about stroke and heart disease
articles.description:
"If I could inspire even one person reading this right now to be proactive about their health ... then every mile and every challenge will have been worth it."

The post This runner is raising awareness about stroke and heart disease appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Runner Liz Lang promotes health awareness for stroke and heart disease in Boston.
Lang aims to inspire at least one person to prioritize their health through her efforts.
Her campaign coincides with the Boston Marathon, engaging local residents in health discussions.

articles.title: Once a patient, now a runner: She’s running for Boston Children’s Hospital
articles.description:
"I want to give back to the hospital that saved my life."

summary: Molly Kokoski, a former patient, is running to support Boston Children's Hospital.
She aims to raise funds during the Boston Marathon on April 15, 2024.
Kokoski's efforts highlight the hospital's vital role in local healthcare.

articles.title: Carles Gil, Revolution extend contract into 2028 to accommodate new MLS schedule
articles.description:
The New England Revolution captain extends his contract amid MLS’s calendar shift.

summary: Carles Gil extends his contract with New England Revolution through 2028.

Boston residents can expect continued leadership from Gil on the field.
